Name: Benett's Terminal
AttributesDescription: The Reserved Terminal owned by Benett, a deceased member of the Montelli family. It is severely damaged, with components missing or broken.
BgDescription: Once repaired by a technician, it can provide information about the movements of its previous owner. However, further repairs are required to unlock more data. Though the deceased cannot speak, this Terminal serves as his voice. Complete the restoration to uncover the mysteryâ€”those covered data may hold the key to the truth you seek.
ObtainedShowDescription: The Reserved Terminal owned by Benett, a deceased member of the Montelli family.
